_items.title: With br and no p
_items.body:
This is the first section. It has words styled with bold, italics, underline, strike-through, strong, and emphasis.

These three words in this second section have been styled with a span and style attribute.

This third section contains a short list.

  • Item 1
  • Item 2

1038 W Monroe St
Chicago IL 60607
